DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical research study assess effect Atazanavir 400 mg QD Atazanavir/Ritonavir 300/100 mg QD steady state single dose pharmacokinetics RGZ healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study With Atazanavir Administered With Without Ritonavir Cytochrome P450 Substrate Rosiglitazone
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 18 50 year old BMI 18 32 kg/m2
